description: Police across France are angered by accusations of racism and by a government ban on chokeholds.
title: French police dump handcuffs in protest to rebuff critics
title_page: French police dump handcuffs in protest to rebuff critics - BBC News
maintext: "We're not going to hold him down for eight minutes, we're going to hold him down just for the handcuffing... we don't have a substitute technique. So how do we do it today?"
